name: Bloodlines - IGS Jamoween 2020
description:
Connect Critical organs using veins in this mini metro inspired strategy game.

The game was developed over 8 days for the Jamoween 2020 Game Jam, which was organised by the Indie Game Squad. The theme of the jam was 'Death is not the end, it's only the beginning'.

Run the game in fullscreen mode otherwise certain elements will not be visible.
 

You can play the game with just a mouse. 

  • Left Click on a vein to select its colour
  • Left Click and Drag to draw from node to node
  • Right Click to pause the game.

If you have a keyboard, you can use:

  • QWER / 1234 to select a vein
  • Esc / Space / p to pause the game
